title: UI issues with git panel in FE
body:
Once we try to give longer strings, panel shows strange UI

- [ ] While trying to create an new branch with longer string, UI got sliced

![Screenshot 2022-10-31 at 9 26 18 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/199053410-89c70b6b-e65e-4828-baf2-140c126cee94.png)

- [ ] For longer branch names, UI got sliced

![Screenshot 2022-10-31 at 9 26 51 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/199053595-2dd6b072-d398-4abf-9e42-ce5970bfe1f2.png)

- [ ] With long branch selected, if I try to type a branch to search, UI is sliced

![Screenshot 2022-10-31 at 9 27 07 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/199053864-bf7fab89-be7a-4a0c-8ea4-02b55b372fd3.png)

- [ ] After long branches, I extended the side panel. When I tried to reduce the size for this, the line for dragging to reduce the size was visible on some inappropriate position

![Screenshot 2022-10-31 at 9 28 42 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/199054158-72ce8b5f-b394-4840-afac-66044bd7da2f.png)

- [ ] Once short branch is selected but longer branch names are there in the list, when I try to search a longer branch name and then shorter branch like `dev`, UI is shifted left side

![Screenshot 2022-10-31 at 9 29 26 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30843294/199054460-48f2dd3f-0d92-450a-bdad-3d9892273096.png)
